titleStmt.title: The new state of England under Their Majesties K. William and Q. Mary in three parts ... / by G.M.
titleStmt.author: Miege, Guy, 1644-1718?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. for Jonathan Robinson ...,

notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p. and separate pagination.

"Containing, I. A geographical description of England in general, and of every county in particular, with useful and curious remarks, II. An account of the inhabitants, their original, genius, customs, laws, religion, and government, of their present Majesties, their court, power, revenue, &c., III. A description of the several courts of judicature, viz. the high court of Parliament, Privy Council, and all other courts, with a catalogue of the present officers in church and state."
Imperfect: Part I, pages 299-302 lacking. Pages 292-309 from defective Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
